title: Vaishnavi Kundan and Emerald Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: Freshwater Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: Intricate Kundan setting showcasing the vibrant sparkle of the stones. Features a graduated design with layers of paisley motifs (Manga Malai influence). The central pendant is a showstopper with a large emerald, surrounded by kundan work and finished with delicate pearl drops. The flexible gold wire ensures comfortable wear.
colors: and emerald green. Pearl drops add a touch of classic elegance.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for traditional functions such as Seemantham (baby shower) and festivals like Diwali and Sankranthi.
description: This exquisite Haaram blends traditional South Indian design with modern craftsmanship. The use of high-quality Kundan stones and natural emeralds ensures brilliance and longevity. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a lustrous finish that will last for generations. Its substantial presence makes it a statement piece that commands attention and exudes elegance. A true heirloom piece.
